alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 3:34AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches above 9000 feet. Strong northeast winds between 30 and 40 mph with gusts 55 to 65 mph will weak considerable by noon. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impossible along Highway 28 especially the farther east. Highway 28 over South Pass could be closed for a couple of days. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strong winds will result in considerable blowing and drifting of snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
